data.name: If It’s for My Client, I’d Even Schedule a Demon Lord
data.detailed_description:
If It’s for My Client, I’d Even Schedule a Demon Lord is a calendar-themed puzzle game where you set schedules while laughing at a parodical fantasy story. Prepare a schedule, one event at a time, to make your clients happy. Resolve schedule conflicts, explore unique worlds, and challenge this time management brain-teaser!


  • 100+ puzzles!
  • Humorous adventure with unique characters.
  • See new schedules, calendars, and characters as you progress.
  • Explore common calendars with 365 days, and fantastical calendars with original days-of-the-week and months.
  • Deal with various types of events from one-time activities to weekly affairs!
  • Take your time, or race the clock.
  • Customize your own colour schemes, or enjoy the varying schemes level-by-level.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Pencil in time on your calendar for this parodical planner puzzle game more like work than any other! This witty career will have you solving schedules for everyone from your brother to a demon lord.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Gold 4415Y 1.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
